text.text_translated:
Julie Wong is a very important researcher. She studies robots and AI. AI means computers can think like people.

She wrote more than 50 papers. She wrote some papers alone. She wrote some with other people. Her papers are in important science journals. A journal is a special magazine for scientists. Other scientists check the work before it is in the journal.

She often speaks at conferences. These are big meetings for scientists in different countries. In 2012, she got a very important award. It was the Royal Academy Simone Fielding fellowship.

Julie lives with her family. They live in a smart home with computers. She made the plan for the house herself.
